title: need one more champion with first letter Q
body: every letter has at least 2 champion starting with that letter except Q. until recently it was both I and Q but Illaoi got released and with Irelia thats 2 champions starting with I. The only champion with first letter Q is Quinn so we need one more so people who like the letter Q has a choice.

replies.body: im sorry you've thought of this and i wish you luck in getting over your OCD

> [{quoted}](name=GigaPube,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZEZ2XBxy,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-25T15:19:20.390+0000)
>
> im sorry you've thought of this and i wish you luck in getting over your OCD

Obviously it's because they want to trash talk the enemy team in champion select by banning Urgot, Quinn and the other Q champion to spell UQQ.
Jihn rhymes with Quinn which starts with Q so close enough Kappa.
